overview: Michael Valera is an entrepreneur, designer & consultant specializing in digital media and IP communications technologies. He is the Founder & CEO of Launch Solutions, a global telecom consulting & web development agency and recent founder of WorldTalk Inc., creator of the Voxtopia mobile voip service. Mr. Valera’s expertise has been sought after by executives & engineers globally, training and enabling dozens of telecom companies & startups around the world. Previously, Mr. Valera was Vice President of Engineering for Worldtel Xchange, a mobile international calling provider, Senior VoIP engineer for award winning IP communications vendor, SysMaster Corporation being the technical lead for all major international deployments. You can connect with Michael by email: mike [at] launchitsolutions [dot] com.
